name: The Christmas Artist
description:
Looks like the presents have arrived, but that lazy crud sack Santa doesn't have time to make it look nice. Seems like its up to you to save Chrismas in this epic action packed sci-fi fantasy adventure. Drag and drop the boxes to make your Chrismas art come to life.

A small fun game I made to celebrate the season. Hope you enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making it.
